title: Other provisions regarding marginal open spaces shall be governed by the proposed height of structure, as given in the provisions (v) below and should conform to the Maharashtra Fire Prevention and Life Safety Measures Act, 2006 (Maharashtra Act No
clause_text: Other provisions regarding marginal open spaces shall be governed by the proposed height of structure, as given in the provisions (v) below and should conform to the Maharashtra Fire Prevention and Life Safety Measures Act, 2006 (Maharashtra Act No.III of 2007) as amended from time to time. No building permission shall be issued without NOC of the Fire Officer. Other regulations regarding room sizes, apertures for light and ventilation shall be as per these Development Control and Promotion Regulations in force.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
